amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Energy to submit a report to Congress on the potential effects commercial utilization of Carbon Capture and Sequestration could have on the economy, energy infrastructure and greenhouse gas emission goals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Veasey amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Veasey amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Veasey.
